name: company-management-system
description: A comprehensive full-stack application for managing companies, users, and accounts with authentication

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint

author: Your Name
